form:
SH - 20 - Adoption - Dashboard - v1.8.10d
Time Range
-24h@h now
, for example user terminated, report on their reports/alerts, scheduling status, manager. Also include Dashboards, Lookups. the goal is to either transfer ownership or retire these objects.
1. User Off-Boarding
Dashboards
| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_dashboards_usage(shcluster_label,app,title)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | search app!="*global_monitoring_console" emp_type="*" emp_status="Terminated" emp_dep="*" emp_lob="*" | table author emp_name emp_status shcluster_label app sharing label title updated emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type Latest_Access description location Num_Searches acl_perms_read acl_perms_write | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_dashboards_fields` $earliest$ $latest$

Lookups
| from lookup:splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_kv_store_lookup | join shcluster_label app sharing Filename type=left [| from lookup:splunk_rest_admin_lookup_table_files_sh_kv_store_lookup | fields shcluster_label,Splunk_Instance,app,sharing,author,disabled,updated,Filename,Lookup_File_Path ] | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | search app!="*global_monitoring_console" emp_status="Terminated" | table author emp_name emp_status shcluster_label app sharing Lookup Type Filename updated Lookup_File_Path Collection emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type acl_perms_read acl_perms_write | `rename_lookup_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` $earliest$ $latest$

Automatic Lookups
| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_props_lookups_sh_kv_store_lookup | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `strftime_format(updated)` | rex field=attribute mode=sed "s/LOOKUP-//g" | lookup splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_kv_store_lookup shcluster_label app Lookup As transform OUTPUT Filename Type Fields_List Collection | search app!="*global_monitoring_console" emp_status="Terminated" | table shcluster_label app sharing acl_perms_read acl_perms_write author emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status stanza updated Type transform Filename Collection value Fields_List overwrite author emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_cc emp_type emp_status | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_auto_lookup_fields` | `rename_lookup_fields` $earliest$ $latest$

Reports/Alerts Tracking
index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_audit_user_login_idx_summary_tracker | table Splunk_Instance Savedsearch_Name App User Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time Priority Window_Time Run_Time Result_Count $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ $TimeRangePkr.latest$
5 none progressbar true false
User Tracking
index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_audit_user_login_idx_summary_tracker | table Splunk_Instance User Login_Source Latest_Access OS_Name OS_Version Browser_Name Browser_Version $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ $TimeRangePkr.latest$
5 none progressbar true false
2. Users not logging into the platform in more than N Days
Days Since Latest Access 90 90
| from lookup:splunk_rest_identities_kv_store_lookup | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_splunk_roles_info(shcluster_label,splunk_role_map)` | stats Values(email) As email Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob Values(emp_name) As emp_name Values(emp_status) As emp_status Values(emp_ttl) As emp_ttl Values(emp_type) As emp_type Values(endDate) As endDate Values(managedBy) As managedBy By shcluster_label identity | lookup splunk_index_audit_user_login_tracker_sh_kv_store_lookup User AS identity OUTPUTNEW Latest_Access Splunk_Instance Login_Source | eval time_diff=now()-Latest_Access | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_1$*24*60*60 | where time_diff > Days_Latest_Access AND emp_type!="Service" AND identity!="admin" | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | `strftime_format(Latest_Access)` | rename time_diff As "Time Since Latest Login" | table identity Latest_Access shcluster_label "Time Since Latest Login" emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields` $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
3. Users Accessing the platform in the last N Days
Days Since Latest Access 90 90
Dashboard Exclusions none none
add exclude _cai_ui_getting_started
| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count latest(_time) As _time FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance IN (*$exclusions$*) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_2$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As identity | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,identity)` | `get_identity_info(identity)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `strftime_format(_time)` | table identity shcluster_label _time emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
4. Users Accessing and leveraging the platform in the last N Days
Days Since Latest Access 90 90
add exclude _cai_ui_getting_started
| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_3$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | table shcluster_label user emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields` $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ $TimeRangePkr.latest$
5 none progressbar true false
5. Dashboards Accesses in the last N Days
Days Since Latest Access 30 30
exclude _cai_ui_getting_started
index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_web_access_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_4$d App!="global_monitoring_console" | fields _time User Splunk_Instance App OS_Name avg_spent Dashboard_Name Latest_Access | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label, User)` | stats Dc(User) As Num_Users Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Latest(_time) As _time By shcluster_label Dashboard_Name | table _time shcluster_label Dashboard_Name emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status Num_Users | `strftime_format(_time)` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields` $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
6. New Dashboards Created or Updated in the last N Days
Dashboards Created/Updated in the last (Days) 7 7
New Dashboards or something else was created, dashboard is efficient, detect it and suggest wider usage
| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | eval time_diff=now()-updated | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_5$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | `strftime_format(updated)` | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label, author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | table updated shcluster_label label title app sharing author emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status time_diff acl_perms_read acl_perms_write description | rename time_diff As "Time Since Latest Login" | `rename_dashboards_fields` | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields` $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
7. Top 10 Usage by LOB
| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | top 10 emp_lob by shcluster_label| `rename_identity_fields` $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ $TimeRangePkr.latest$
5 none progressbar true false
7. Top 10 Usage by Department
| tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | top 10 emp_dep by shcluster_label| `rename_identity_fields` $TimeRangePkr.earliest$ $TimeRangePkr.latest$
5 none progressbar true false
8. Knowledge Object Creation by LOB/Department (on going development activities)
| from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `strftime_format(updated)` | stats count by emp_lob| `rename_identity_fields` $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
9. Knowledge Object that has been touched "worked on" in the last 30/60/90, show if sharing has changed since its important for adoption
Days Since Latest Access 30 30
index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name IN (splunk_rest_admin_eventtypes_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_admin_lookup_table_files_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_configs_conf_props_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_macros_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_models_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_calcfields_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_extractions_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_fieldaliases_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_lookups_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_transforms_extractions_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data) NOT author IN (system, admin, splunk-system-user) updated=* earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_6$d | eval time_diff = now() - updated | eval Days_Latest_Access = $Days_Latest_Access_6$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | `get_ko_type` | eval title = case ( search_name="splunk_rest_admin_lookup_table_files_sh_summary_data", Filename, search_name="splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_summary_data", Lookup, search_name="splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data", savedsearch_name, search_name="splunk_rest_data_props_calcfields_sh_summary_data", name, match(search_name, "splunk_rest_data_props_fieldaliases_sh_summary_data|splunk_rest_data_props_extractions_sh_summary_data|splunk_rest_data_props_lookups_sh_summary_data"), attribute, true(), title) | stats Latest(updated) As updated Latest(time_diff) As time_diff count by shcluster_label Knowledge_Object_Type app sharing author title | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | table shcluster_label Knowledge_Object_Type title app sharing author emp_name emp_ttl emp_dep emp_lob emp_type emp_status updated time_diff | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields` | rename Knowledge_Object_Type As "Knowledge Object Type", title As "Knowledge Object Name" app As App updated As "Knowledge Object Update Time" time_diff As "Updated in the last" author As User $earliest$ $latest$
5 none progressbar true false
